website_summaries.verdict: For the price, Sony's wireless MDR-XB950N1 headphones deliver laudable noise cancellation and strong wireless audio with adjustable bass response.
pros: Exceptionally powerful bass that can be adjusted using app
cons: Dialed-up bass isn't for people seeking an accurate mix
No remote/inline mic on audio cable

customer_reviews.title: WEAK
customer_reviews.text: Worth it. But I expected more from the bass, coming from a Skullcandy (definetly overpowered on that one) Noise cancellation ok, but not great EDIT: very weak, broke as showed
customer_reviews.author: Pietro Berto

customer_reviews.title: Sony Wireless Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to the "Battery lasts me 24 hours... battery lasts me 20 hours" because nobody listens to music for that long... i listen to music going to work and coming back and when im in bed going to sleep every day, and these last me over a week. Great sound, dependent on the music it sometimes has too much bass but more is better because you can always reign it in, the app that you can get with it is useless, but the headphones themselves are very comfortable, have great sound and the noise cancelling is actually decent(just don't use it indoor if you don't need to). Im happy with my purchase and would definitely reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars > changed to Two stars
customer_reviews.text: Having for sometime now. Sound and comfort is greater than some flagship over 300£ >changed to two stars, cause of weird moment. for no reason one of the ear piece holder, cracked. and now it look like one of the side gonna fall of. -Never been dropped or squashed. sound is good, base is good and the app is good as well but material is bad(didn't expect it to break down). disappointed, now I need to buy new headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandrs

customer_reviews.title: Fragile Build, expected better from such a Premium Sony Headset.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works well. However the quality of the plastic is doubtful . Only purchased in late October 2019 and today they have broken on the right earcup. Past Amazons standard return policy of 30 days and unable to establish Sony’s warranty and how you go about a replacement set . Only brought this to future purchasers attention as there are other reviews highlighting the same manufacturing issue. Sadly in my case the brand hasn’t lived up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: nigel graham

customer_reviews.title: Sony Headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice headphone. Unfortunately, its only good for Apple Products (iPhone, Ipad and Ipods) for a specific models Otherwise, the headphone bass is excellent and the cost is reasonably priced compared to Bose. I have Bose, its very expensive. This is almost half the price. It has also noise cancelling on top of the extra bass. Buy this headphone .
customer_reviews.author: yacht_afficionado

customer_reviews.title: A solid 4 stars product
customer_reviews.text: + Sound quality + Noice Cancelation is good (not great) + They are Foldable + Over-ear style + Cool App + Soft Cushions + Very well place controls + Confortable - The Design isn't great. They look outdated and they are really big - Poor microphone - Charging time is too much - Multiparing is not possible - You can not charge at the same time you're listen some music - No box for caring your headphones, only a pouch - They do suffer in the wind. The ear cups have little grates in them, so wind blows through and causes a lot of distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Had this less than 6 months and it won't charge or switch on.
customer_reviews.text: I was absoloutly over the moon with the quality of these headphones when they arrived, however just 5 months later and they have already stopped charging. Apparently this is a common problem after much googling! Sadly, I will not be recommending them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bass and sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found the headphones with the excellent sound I was after! The bass is wow and it doesn't cut out all other sounds like most other headphones do. They also feel comfortable on at first for say the first 2 hours but then it tends to then feel a bit achy on the ears but that really doesn't bother me. It does what it says its supposed to do. These are a definite keep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these Sony Headphones absolute treat to the ears! The sound and bass is just perfect. The battery life is very decent. I think with any headphones if you have them on for too long your ears do hurt a little but other than that they are comfortable. It can be a bit annoying wearing them on a windy day. You get the wind just bettering against the headphones but again that'll be for any headphones you were. The colour is just wow! Look amazing in the sun! Had loads of compliments about them. Defo get these if you're wanting an upgrade but in the mid price range!
customer_reviews.author: sakura

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds. Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these headphones but they have recently broken through the headphone hanger bracket whilst in protective case. After searching online I found this to be a common issue. Mine are now out of warranty and Sony have quoted ~75% of current retail price to repair a small plastic part.. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Essential for Bass Heads
customer_reviews.text: My mate purchased these a week ago and raved on about the extreme levels of bass that these puppies drive out and I was keen to give them a try. I now believe in love at first sight - I was sold instantly and hastily purchased myself a pair. As an extreme bass head these are MORE than enough and have forced me to turn the bass down at times (not a sentence I thought I would ever say) TLDR; purchase these if you want incredible bass with the added features of comfort, long battery life and easy to use controls
customer_reviews.author: Holt

customer_reviews.title: A "meh" product. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality isnt nearly as good as people say it is. The bass effect isnt punchy. Its more of a reverb bass on normal volume. It only becomes slightly punchy as you crank the volume up to max. The highs are very recessed and its just low and mids. I really thought it would be a neutral sound with emphasis on bass but its more of a drop curve. Noise cancelling is better than i thought it would be and so is the battery life. The build seems nice but the pads are already getting white streaks from the stiches. So the pads are bad. Overall its a pretty "meh" product.
customer_reviews.author: Uzair ilyas

customer_reviews.title: Best sound quality I've had
customer_reviews.text: I have recommended these to multiple friends and will continue to. The sound is great and as a lover of the feeling of bass, these will always be my go-to. The noise cancellation does work to an extent but for some bizarre reason makes me feel like I have a lot of pressure being forced onto my head and makes my somewhat dizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after buying the Sony h.ear on 2 after they started sounding a bit crackly with only after a few months use. I've found the sound quality on these is actually much better and they are much more comfortable and after a few months use no change. The only functionality I miss is the swipe feature on the H.ear on 2. I've tried different wireless headphones over the last months for best sound quality and this is definitely the best so far!
customer_reviews.author: Vi11345

customer_reviews.title: No more unwanted outside noise
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after recent long haul plane journey using non noise cancelling headphones..........At home, they do everything they say on the box they will do. Looking forward to using them on my next journey. And not in direct competition with my other half!
customer_reviews.author: Pattipat63

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these headphones. The extra bass is impressive and the sound cancelling is really good. The sound quality is excellent. They were really easy to connect to my phone and dont cut out like other bluetooth headphones. They are very comfortable and look very well built. I have practically had them on since i got them (yes seriously, i love my music) and the battery life is also really good. You definitely get what u pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are easy to use and I uses the Bluetooth feature to watch films late at night without anyone in my house losing sleep, I was told I needed a Bluetooth TV but I didn't, my TV is not Bluetooth my DVD player is and they work just fine. My only real gripe is the volume is hard to adjust and it is a bit fiddly putting my headphones in the pouch when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher John Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Too much bass
customer_reviews.text: The bass is overwhelming and I ended up turning the extra bass feature off to have a decent sound which. The sound is rather flat and unclear. Its good for movies or gaming maybe but wasn't convinced to keep them. Returned them and bought different headphones
customer_reviews.author: Patryk Anton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and amazing bass
customer_reviews.text: Used to wear beats solo, but the tight fit made them uncomfortable to wear for long periods when studying. These Sonys are amazing quality for the price. I could wear them all day. The earphones are very comfortable and envelope the entire ear. I'm not a audiophile, but these headphones sound amazing to me, I listen to all types of music and the sound is always spot on. Bass effect functionality is epic!
customer_reviews.author: raj

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Really happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of headphones for boyfriend’s 31st birthday. He listens to music a lot so I really wanted to take a good one. I compared multiple brands and went in a store to test them. I thought this one had the best sound and bass, plus it’s very comfortable. I picked the dark green one and my gift was a complete success. My boyfriend has his headphones since 2 months, working perfectly well and he loves them. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Laure P.

customer_reviews.title: Good design if you like extra bass.
customer_reviews.text: The noise canceling is effective, not because of the circuit, but because the headphone already isolates external sounds by design. I didn't see any relevant difference between this version and the xb950b1. The battery life is excellent and the sound quality is good (especially if you're not an audiophile; the headphone is "bass-focused" and it doesn't perform well in a good range of frequencies).
customer_reviews.author: João Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: My other half lives in them when he leaves the house, and can't hear a word I say sometimes. Apparently the occasional rude person on the bus gets through when not listening to music, but when playing music can't be heard. He loves the sound and says they have good bass, and can go very loud without distorting. He charges them about once a week despite a lot of use, plus if used with their cable do not need charge. They also seem to be of good build quality and fold to store in their bag safely.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bridgeman

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sound quality, Sony as usual. The weakest point I think is comfort. It is painful to wear them for more than 2 hours unless you got steel ears. I think the same model with "over the ears" would be much better. Another thing is the sensitivity of the microphones (there are two, one on each side). If you use the headphones for calling the other side will hear you and surrounding sounds too loudly.
customer_reviews.author: ChromeT

customer_reviews.title: Insane!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say other than these headphone are just insane. For the first 2 days I was left a bit dissatisfied as the bass just didn't seemed to be there. But to my surprise about a 4 days later it felt like the headphones had been turn to 11. My only guess is it's for the headphones protection that the bass is turned down until a certain time period of usage to wear them in. But my god once they have your ears and head will shake.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Decent high quality headphones bellow 200GBP.
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, the best headphones you can get out there without (completely) losing your wallet. The noise cancelling is ok, it's pretty good cancelling ambient and regular noises (such as engines, ACs) but it won't make your loud colleague Ralph inaudible. There is some attenuation but voices are not cancelled.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Matos

customer_reviews.title: Annoying beeps and too quiet
customer_reviews.text: Software is useless. Annoying woman interupts you every time you eg hire the volume? Yeah that's what i wanted from my £150 headphones Secondary point is there just not loud enough either Dearest headphones ive ever purchased and i was very dissapoineted to be honest
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Erghh, I wanna vommit. I bought these for thumping bass and there is no bass. The lows are yucky and the highs feel like needles through my hears. The build quality is amazing but the clamping force is high.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headphones, superb bass with the rest of the range clear , noise cancellation is good and active, of course the down side is that its heavy and bulkier than its competition. And it doesn't come with a case
customer_reviews.author: Raafat

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones at the great price the sound is fantastic and very loud and not forgetting the bass are very good especially if you like lots of bass the only thing these are on the big side but not uncomfortable when wearing them
customer_reviews.author: James Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for many uses -Gym
customer_reviews.text: The bass is immense, amazing headphones for many different uses. I use the headphones to watch videos, listen to music, and play games. Great sounding headphones with crazy strong bass altough the bass can be adjusted through the downloadable able. Do not recommend for training, as when I lay down onto a bench the headphones move or sometimes fall off the head.
customer_reviews.author: Mantas Stadnik

customer_reviews.title: Weak brakes easily but very good bass/sound.
customer_reviews.text: Had them since Christmas 2019 and yesterday they broke at the left ear side with a small crack. Very brittle plastic had other Sony headphones for over 3years and didn't break. But sound quality is very good if you love bass and noise cancelling is good
customer_reviews.author: heppy

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality brilliant along with the noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality brilliant along with the noise cancelling, comfort and bass. However, build quality is shocking. broke after two months of use. Really disappointed at such a poorly built product for price it is. Right side hinge started to crack before eventually snapping. Were great while they lasted. Will be moving on to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dom Kozyra

customer_reviews.title: No regrets for the price
customer_reviews.text: Can use these for around 10 hours between charges. Great sound quality and optional bass boat. Noise cancelling works very well in most situations. Not too comfortable if you wear glasses, found myself getting headaches due to pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound and range
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones . I have bose QC 35 ‘s and beats studio as well and all good depending on what you want .But if you just want a really good set of headphones to listen to your tunes . These are great . If you’re mixing go with the beats .
customer_reviews.author: MYLES

customer_reviews.title: Been using for a solid 3/4months and I have to say, not a SINGLE problem.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is fantastic. The bass is fantastic. The bluetooth connectivity is fantastic (Poor if your phone is poor, not the headphones) I've even gone out in the pouring rain and the headphones still survived and continue to pump out great sound. I love them and couldn't have got a better replacement to some dr.dre studios I had owned for 6+ years. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: My favourite pair of headphones. So worth the money especially when they can be used with Bluetooth or wire, it comes with an app to mix the sound, has great sound quality and great noice cancellation. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Louise2of11

customer_reviews.title: BASS BASS BASS IF YOU LOVE BASS GET THESE
customer_reviews.text: If you like Bass then these are for you. Great piece of kit. The only niggle is is that the bass can be overpowering on some songs but all you need to do is turn off the bass. Great headphones 100% better then beats
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. J. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: No noise cancelling when there is no music
customer_reviews.text: No noise cancelling when there is no music, the sound is good but I've heard better but since I'm rating it :)). Cant say anything about battery life i only used them for about 2hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Opelend

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: These are poor quality headphones for the price. The noise cancellation is poor as outside noise is still loud when n/c turned on. Sound quality is muffled and there is annoying blue flashing light which flashes constantly during use so can’t be used for relaxing as light catches corner of eyes. I will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Carrera

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is under par for the money. I've had the headphones under a week and have cracks on both sides looked at other reviews and seems a common problem. The noise cancelling works to a degree. And the sound quality is not as good as lower cost headphones. One other problem I had was if you used the headphones turned off ie with aux lead no batteries, the sound quality became unbearable. So in summary avoid these headphones
customer_reviews.author: kim ransome

customer_reviews.title: Sound fantastic and to the average side head it would have ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality item sadly my head shape caused problems with comfort. Sound fantastic and to the average side head it would have been perfect. Returned as I did not fit the ear phones and that is the only reason. Highly recommend for sound quality with extra bass is that's your thing.
customer_reviews.author: john reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Headphones if you love bass. Have used them for about 2 months now. They have been perfect, battery life will easily last a week with high usage. Great value for money and better than a lot of headphones out there
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Accidentally ordered them twice as a gift so I kept a pair for myself, no regrets!! I’ve been using these headphones for 2.5 years now and honestly still cannot get enough. Noise cancellation is amazing even on half volume I don’t have to listen to anyone 😂. If you are wondering whether to get them or not... DO!! (Download the app for them too to personalise sound and bass)!
customer_reviews.author: AbbieBallard

customer_reviews.title: Good but..
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones due to general praise online for great bass and noise cancelling. Both of these are true and they are all round great headphones but I did notice some static noise in them which can be annoying when no sound is playing. This is not a fault of my pair as I sent the first pair I bought back because I thought it was a fault but the second had it to. Also the build quality feels cheap considering their price. Other wise all bass lovers will enjoy these.
customer_reviews.author: Archie

customer_reviews.title: Sony MDR-XB950N1B
customer_reviews.text: Super headphones with a great sound quality and with all the controls on the headphones so you don’t need to take your phone etc out of your pocket. Slightly heavier than say the Bose equivalent but I think they are better made and therefore are sturdier. Also a lot cheaper on Amazon that the high street.
customer_reviews.author: Saint 0903

customer_reviews.title: Great bass and sound
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are immense. The sound quality is brilliant and the noise cancelling is good enough for a car journey / plane journey. They are extremely comfortable and don’t weigh very much. The NFC is a very useful feature and works great. The only bad thing is that the hinge seems a little thin and that they don’t have a hard shell case in the box but I’ve got a decent one for £4
customer_reviews.author: Angus A

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I'm speechless with these headphones , the sound quality ? excellent, please don't mess with these headphones EXTRA BASS because is powerful than what you may handle, caution - eardrums.
customer_reviews.author: MegaCity - GWINEG

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Great long battery life. Intuitive controls. Noise cancelling is decent but not as good as other phones I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: A Wezer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever had the pleasure of owning, was reluctant about getting them as I didn't know how good they would be but I highly recommend these! Brilliant sound especially the Bass boost and the Noise Cancelling is wonderful. Never had an issue with these since the day I got them, if you're looking for a brilliant pair of headphones look no further!
customer_reviews.author: T Bain

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on Bluetooth TV...
customer_reviews.text: Great works Bluetooth on Smart Phone Mobile but sadly not on Bluetooth TV... so had to Return the Item !!
customer_reviews.author: M Yazdani

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of time as it was stated it was used but in very good condition but that was not correct as they were faulty
customer_reviews.author: Kerwin

customer_reviews.title: wonderful for hip-hop/rap/electronic/dance
customer_reviews.text: Great bass dependent on wether you have the app or not. Not so good on high end and sometimes roles off due to overly prominent bass. Overall, if you love bass, then get these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jenkers1992

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. They are a bit big and heavy but the sound,the bass effect and the noise cancelling are just amazing. It should come with a case for this price.
customer_reviews.author: ruben silva

customer_reviews.title: Best model in the price range for sure
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this Headphone I had a Beats studio. I can say for sure that the sound quality of Sony is 10x better than the Beats. Additionally, the Beats used to hurt my ears after a while but with the Sony XB950N1 I can listen to music for hours and still don't fell anything. I loved the product. Best model you can get for this price range for SURE
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye chaos!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to wear during cycle training... Noise cancelling any creaks from the equipment and were generally well received
customer_reviews.author: ShroodJude

customer_reviews.title: Really good at the price point
customer_reviews.text: Totally impressed with the features and functions. Not high end but a close second considering they cost a third of the market leader.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for Bassheads
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sounding headphones i have ever listened to, deep bass loud and it dosent distort when its high vol, has a very good battery life, and the noise canceling is exelent to have on when outside, these are outstanding and bassheads like me will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Bailly P.

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphone ever! Great in gym, jogging & on a plane. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound but not good noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound and premium quality plastic. My favourite thing is that it lasts for a extremely long time on a full charge. However the noise cancelling is not the best but definitely enough on a plane or car.
customer_reviews.author: mrsratty

customer_reviews.title: 1 year on
customer_reviews.text: Had these a year now. battery still lasts over 2 full shifts at work, the electronic noise cancelling is great. I don't hear my colleagues waffling on all day - perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BASSSSSSS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bass Is The Best Key Feature For This If You Love Bass Get These Any Bass Lover Will Love These
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the commute
customer_reviews.text: Great noise cancelling and base effect. I have used these on the bus every day for the last month and would recommend. Battery life is very good.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Sound Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, amazing bass. The noise cancellation works, but maybe not as well as some of the other options out there. Still worth every penny though.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Best bass headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones on the market for bass lovers also sound quality is unbelievable great for a bass headphone
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money and bass is so mesmerizing gives an effect of Sun woofer on your ears. Noise cancellation is really good. Weight might be the issue for some, otherwise it's really good headphone with good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Rajiv S.

customer_reviews.title: She buy again
customer_reviews.text: Thay works really well no problems at all she really likes them
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: NO for phone calls and OK for music
customer_reviews.text: Great for music but terrible with calls. Noise cancellation is above average. Too sensitive mic that captures all the background noises and irritates the callers.
customer_reviews.author: Hari

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for mobile devices but doesn't work well with computers.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Im stuck for words...
customer_reviews.text: No point getting £300 headphones when these beast blow your ears away. Wow, i cant stop. Themusic feels more powerful
customer_reviews.author: Raheem

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and very good noise cancelling. Fits perfectly around ears and never gets too hot. It's very good on winter, i'll wait for summer to test it.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great, but fix the damned cable!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good, battery lasts insanely long & charges extremely quickly, but I'm struggling to understand how difficult it was to have a decent sized charging cable. The charging cable is FAR too short. Elongate the charging cable!
customer_reviews.author: Callan

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: If you’re thinking about coping it then give it a try, I doubt you’ll regret it. My box didn’t come with a 3.5mm jack lid so packaging could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Vitor Sousa

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: this is the best sony headphone i have ever purchased it work for any situation and it is the real sony xb950n1 so if you thought it was fake it is not
customer_reviews.author: Ibz Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. Can get warm if using for a while. Battery okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bass and sound quality is indeed excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of headphone. If you're into bass and sound quality, I highly recommend this headphone.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Savage
customer_reviews.text: i love these headphones, the bass boost is amazing. Sound is great , only durability test Iv done is they fell out of the car once but they’re grand. 100% would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mc Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality product
customer_reviews.text: Broke with 2 wears. Poor build quality. Also they are huge on your head
customer_reviews.author: Mr J W J Kemsley

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones, and amazing bass. Louder than my wired Sony in ear extra bass headphones and the noise cancelling is quite good. Absolutely love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my boyfriend as a present and he loved them. They go completely around your ears so they’re not pressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Geoleria

customer_reviews.title: I love it !
customer_reviews.text: its great for its price and might be the best for bass
customer_reviews.author: abdallah al.dobikhi

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones bass is very good and sound quality is good and Battery life Recommend them to anyone Best headphones I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.author: Jordanspicer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones. Solid noise cancellation, great noise and the bass is great. Thoroughly recommend as a pair of Bluetooth headphones with great bass for a mid range price!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Braisby

customer_reviews.title: extremely comfortable, the bass is really nice too
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying them so far, extremely comfortable, the bass is really nice too. unfortunately the cable doesn't come with an inline mic.
customer_reviews.author: rahana

customer_reviews.title: BASS!!
customer_reviews.text: If you love bass these headphones are for you. Ive tested some heavy bass boosted music on these and they handle the bass easy, no distortion and very clean bass. Con - bass function only works on IOS and Android with sony headphones app
customer_reviews.author: hoori kopa

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had these for approx a month so far. Worth every penny. Bass is amazing and it is quite closed back so people won’t be disturbed by your music. Sound cancelling works like a charm in busses and overall it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product with solid bass but need a wee bit more on the Noise cancellation
customer_reviews.author: debo

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch

customer_reviews.title: They are worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these for a few hours now and I think buying these headphone was the best decision I’ve ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Oana Rac

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones - absolutely delighted.
customer_reviews.text: I found choosing a pair of headphones very difficult. General reviews online seemed to endorse these headphones so I took the plunge and got them, and it's fair to say I haven't looked back. They're very comfortable, they look great, battery life is really good, and most importantly sound quality is decent and you can really feel the difference in bass with the effect turned on. For casual listening and general wear I would really recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: P76768

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, good sounding headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've personally bought so can't rate them any lower than this.

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful headset very comfortable on the head and fits snugly ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful headset very comfortable on the head and fits snugly over the ears. Sound reproduction is very good would definitely recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ripley

product_meta.title: Sony MDR-XB950N1B Wireless Noise Cancelling Extrabass Headphones - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlackDelve deeper into sound with the first ever Sony Noise Cancelling EXTRA BASS headphones. EXTRA BASS enhances all your low-end frequencies, lifting every track with wave after wave of thundering rhythm. And with the new Sony Headphones Connect app you can adjust your bass levels and use presents for outdoor-stage, club, hall, or arena style sound so you can customize them to your listening preferences. Or put the world on mute. Digital Noise Cancelling cuts out ambient noise so you can hear more of the detail in every track. Listen for hours in comfort with soft-cushioned ear pads, and pack them easily into your bag thanks to the foldable design. Most importantly, lose the cables but not the sound quality with wireless listening over Bluetooth® for up to 22 hours, even with EXTRA BASS and Noise Cancelling turned on. Available in black and green.

BOX CONTAINS
Sony MDR-XB950N1 Wireless Noise Cancelling EXTRABASS Headphones
Carrying pouch
Connection Cable
USB Cable
Quick Start Guide
feature_bullets: Enhanced deep punchy bass sound with EXTRABASS
Digital Noise Cancelling technology. Charge time: approximately 7 hours
High quality wireless audio with Bluetooth
Up to 22 hours of battery life. Frequency Response- 20Hz-20,000Hz(POWER ON)(Wired). Wearing Style- Around Ear
Optimize your sound setting with Sony Headphones Connect app
